description: Learned borrowing from Latin suspīrātiō, suspīrātiōnem (“sighing”).

entries.meaning: The act of breathing, not necessarily for a sustained period (compare respiration, which is sustained).
examples: and the assistance of the inward Intercostal Muscles in deep Suspirations, when we take more large gulps of Aire to cool our heart overcharged with Love or Sorrow  […]
